### At the begining of PR title and commit message, please follow below standardï¼š

- âœ¨ featï¼šA new feature
- ğŸ”§ choreï¼šupdating chore tasks etc
- ğŸ“ docsï¼šDocumentation only changes
- ğŸ› fixï¼šA bug fix
- ğŸš€ perfï¼šA code change that improves performance
- ğŸ”¨ refactorï¼šA code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature
- âª revertï¼šcode revert to specific commit or version
- ğŸ¨ styleï¼šChanges that do not affect the meaning of the code (white-space, formatting, missing semi-colons, etc)
- âœ… testï¼šAdding missing tests or correcting existing tests
- ğŸ“¦ buildï¼šChanges that affect the build system or external dependencies (example scopes: gulp, broccoli, npm)
- ğŸ‘· ciï¼šChanges to our CI configuration files and scripts (example scopes: Travis, Circle)

ğŸ‰ releaseï¼ˆonly used in PR titleï¼‰ï¼šsubmit release version
